body:
Here's a temporary fix, I've put the giflib tarball at https://deepdetect.com/stuff/giflib-5.1.4.tar.gz
Then modify the two files below by replacing the sourceforge URL with the one above.
- `tensorflow/workspace.bzl`
- `tensorflow/contrib/cmake/external/gif.cmake`
  cc @Mike-Dax
